General.Name: Kurniamitra Duta Sentosa Tbk
General.Description: PT Kurniamitra Duta Sentosa, Tbk operates as a food and beverage company in Indonesia. It distributes and sells syrups, fruit mixes, and sauces; coffee products; almond milk, soy milk, coconut milk, dairy milk, and free lactose milk products; and coffee makers. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tangerang Selatan, Indonesia. PT Kurniamitra Duta Sentosa, Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Miki Ojisan Indomitra.
General.Address: Jl. Komplek Pergudangan Multi Guna T8, Tangerang Selatan, Indonesia, 15325

AddressData.Street: Jl. Komplek Pergudangan Multi Guna T8
